location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to Captain Hardy, Commanding the Honourable Company's Cruizer Hastingsand late Acting Resident at Bushire, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck-out in pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter enclosing an extract from a letter [not in the file] received at the Residency from John Wedderburn, Accountant General. Stannus states that the letter gives details of a balance of 3472.2.65 (in rupees, annas and pies) due to the Residency by Hardy. Stannus requests that Hardy forward an acknowledgement and a voucher to take credit for the amount.
